summary: THE CONSUMER HAD DIFFICULTY SHIFTING THE GEARS WHEN A PASSER BY INFORMED HIM TO EXIT THE VEHICLE BECAUSE IT WAS ON FIRE.  THE FIRE IN THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT TOTALED THE VEHICLE.    *NLM.  *AK   *CB  *NLM   THE CONSUMER NOTICED FIRE COMING FROM THE GEAR SHIFT AND WAS TOLD THE FIRE HAD COME FROM THE ENGINE.   *SCC  *JB
